channel.title: CVE Feed for Trend Micro -- Trend Micro Antivirus for Mac
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Trend Micro -- Trend Micro Antivirus for Mac

item.title: CVE-2021-25227|2024-08-03T19:56:11.062Z -- trend%20micro -- trend%20micro%20antivirus%20for%20mac
item.description: Trend Micro Antivirus for Mac 2021 (Consumer) is vulnerable to a memory exhaustion vulnerability that could lead to disabling all the scanning functionality within the application. Please note: an attacker must first obtain the ability to execute low-privileged code on the target system in order to exploit this vulnerability - i.e. the attacker must already have access to the target system (either legitimately or via another exploit).

item.title: CVE-2022-27883|2024-08-03T05:41:10.659Z -- trend%20micro -- trend%20micro%20antivirus%20for%20mac
item.description: A link following vulnerability in Trend Micro Antivirus for Mac 11.5 could allow an attacker to create a specially-crafted file as a symlink that can lead to privilege escalation. Please note that an attacker must at least have low-level privileges on the system to attempt to exploit this vulnerability.

item.title: CVE-2022-24671|2024-08-03T04:20:49.102Z -- trend%20micro -- trend%20micro%20antivirus%20for%20mac
item.description: A link following privilege escalation vulnerability in Trend Micro Antivirus for Max 11.0.2150 and below could allow a local attacker to modify a file during the update process and escalate their privileges. Please note: an attacker must first obtain the ability to execute low-privileged code on the target system in order to exploit this vulnerability.

item.title: CVE-2021-28648|2024-08-03T21:47:33.215Z -- trend%20micro -- trend%20micro%20antivirus%20for%20mac
item.description: Trend Micro Antivirus for Mac 2020 v10.5 and 2021 v11 (Consumer) is vulnerable to an improper access control privilege escalation vulnerability that could allow an attacker to establish a connection that could lead to full local privilege escalation within the application. Please note that an attacker must first obtain the ability to execute low-privileged code on the target system to exploit this vulnerability.
